content: need a stash-busting crochet project 15 yards of yarn will get you 1 coaster with this pattern the petalicious coaster uses the single_crochet stitch and double_crochet stitch cluster stitch to create this easy and quick project #4 medium weight 100% cotton yarn and a 4 5mm hook is recommended video tutorial - coming soon > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
